m_szDocTitle: Tesla Letter To "Frequent" Supercharger Users Ruffles Feathers & Raises Several Questions | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Of course I should have said: I agree with Josh Mirone !! Bart Lubbers Tesla leads the way with supercharging. I wouldn’t have a problem to pay $ 100 per month for supercharging at a Supercharger Station between home and work. It’s 40x faster than charging at home. So it’s a fair deal to me. Please Elon, let me pay for Supercharging ! http://zacharyshahan.com/ Zachary Shahan Thanks. I agree that this needs to transition to a paid system, but that it will still be insanely awesome and a critical piece of the EV revolution. Bart Lubbers Thanks Zach, Paying for convenience charging will decrease
